definition: a turning aside (of your course or attention or concern)
details:
noun
- a turning aside (of your course or attention or concern)
= example: a turning aside (of your course or attention or concern)
= synonyms: digression
- an activity that diverts or amuses or stimulates
= example: an activity that diverts or amuses or stimulates
= synonyms: recreation
- an attack calculated to draw enemy defense away from the point of the principal attack
= synonyms: diversionary attack
